mapper.insert: insert into letsfutsal.team (team_name, leader_id, gender, min_grade, max_grade, region, introduction) values (#{team.teamName}, #{team.leaderId}, #{team.gender}, #{team.minGrade}, #{team.maxGrade}, #{team.region}, #{team.introduction})
mapper.select: select u.* from letsfutsal.user u join letsfutsal.team_member tm on u.user_id = tm.user_id where tm.team_id = #{teamId}
mapper.update: update letsfutsal.team set team_name = #{team.teamName}, gender = #{team.gender}, min_grade = #{team.minGrade}, max_grade = #{team.maxGrade}, region = #{team.region}, introduction = #{team.introduction} where team_id = #{team.teamId}
